Feedback: The design is sleek and user-friendly. Some sections take longer to load. Overall, the experience is decent, but it could be better with minor adjustments.
The job filters are intuitive and easy to use. Some job postings do not include enough details. It gets the job done but lacks depth in job descriptions.
The application process is seamless and straightforward. It is difficult to save a draft application. The process is fine but could use more save features.
The site has a modern look that aligns with current design trends. The homepage feels cluttered at times. Visuals are appealing, but simplifying them would help.
Excellent mobile responsiveness—works well on all devices. Some buttons are too small for mobile use. Good mobile site, with slight improvements needed for accessibility.
The career tips section is a great addition for job seekers. It's hard to find on the main page. Helpful once found, but navigation could be more intuitive.
The FAQs page answers most questions effectively. The formatting could be more engaging. It serves its purpose but could look better.
The site’s search functionality is fast and accurate. It struggles with certain keywords. It’s functional but could be more optimized.
The site uses professional and appealing colors. Sometimes, the text contrasts poorly with the background. It’s visually pleasing but could use better contrast.
I love the integration with social media platforms for easy application sharing. It lacks options for certain niche platforms. The core integration is solid.
The registration process is simple and quick. There’s no option to register using LinkedIn. It works well, but adding more options would enhance it.
The career blog posts are informative and relevant. The page takes too long to load at times. It’s valuable content, hindered by load speed.
The job alerts feature is highly beneficial. There’s no way to customize the frequency. It’s effective but could use more customization.
